info.title: GiftCard Hub API
info.description:
The GiftCard Hub API allows interaction with all GiftCard Providers registered to a store from a single point. GiftCradsProviders are systems capable of providing cards for use in the buying process.

The following is the sequence diagram that represents calls in the purchase closing process.

![alt Picking and Packing Actors](https://raml.vtexlab.com.br/gift-card-hub/images/CardByList.png "Flow")

**Checkout + Gateway**: Systems responsible for the sale and processing orders and payments.

**GiftCard Hub**: System responsible for managing multiple registered giftacard providers for a store.

**GiftCard Provider**: System responsible for providing the giftcards available to the user not closing purchase. This system can be implemented by third parties.

get.description: Returns a collection of giftcard providers from a store.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: Name of the VTEX account. Used as part of the URL

parameters.name: environment
parameters.description: Environment to use. Used as part of the URL

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: Media type(s) that is/are acceptable for the response. Default value for payment provider protocol is application/json.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: The Media type of the body of the request. Default value for payment provider protocol is application/json.

parameters.name: REST-Range
parameters.description: Pagination control. This query variable must follow the format _resources={from}-{to}_.

parameters.name: X-PROVIDER-API-AppKey
parameters.description: The AppKey configured by the merchant (optional configuration)

parameters.name: X-PROVIDER-API-AppToken
parameters.description: The AppToken configured by the merchant (optional configuration)
